## Description {#details}

Templated storage wrapper for a callable.

This class is consistently default constructible, copy / move constructible / assignable.

Supported callable types:
<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> pointer</li>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> reference</li>
<li>Lambda</li>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> object</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 210 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
